casebody.data:
In the Matter of the WILL OF Junior Warren BEANE, Deceased
appealed by Joan K. Beane. No. 152P08. Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 11, 2008. R. Kenneth Helms, Jr., James Allen Lee, Monroe, for Joan Beane. Stephan R. Futrell, Rockingham, for Brad Denson, et al.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 7th day of April 2008 by Propounder in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 11th day of June 2008."
